version_description:
10 new cool calligraphic fonts

App size is now 4 times smaller

And bug fix!)

10 new cool calligraphic fonts

App size is now 4 times smaller

And bug fix!)

10 new cool calligraphic fonts

App size is now 4 times smaller

And bug fix!)

10 new cool calligraphic fonts

App size is now 4 times smaller

And bug fix!)

Hello!
I hope you wash your hands and keep calm :)
#stayhome

What's in the update:

- Now fonts can be used in any photo and video editors, now they are saved with a transparent background
- You can also paste text from the clipboard
- Fixed a rare bug with the retore of the purchase

I know that the cursor movement is not enough, I'm working on it :)

Hello!

#stayhome

What's in the update:

- Now fonts can be used in any photo and video editors, now they are saved with a transparent background

I know that the cursor movement is not enough, I'm working on it :)

Bug fix!

The text which contains the characters "/" and "," now works)
The background for calligraphic fonts is now also transparent when saved and used in other applications

Last update:

Finally, you can move the cursor!)

Also added 4 new cool fonts
And the ability to change the background in the editor

Do not get tired of reminding - wash your hands and stay at home!

Привет! Поздравляю всех с наступлением лета, но всё же будьте аккуратны, пандемия никуда не делась!

Что нового в этой версии?

- 6 Новых каллиграфических шрифтов
- Удаление шрифтов свайпом (чтобы освободить место)
- Обновление статических шрифтов
- Исправления ошибок

Привет!
Поздравляю с наступлением лета, солнца и хорошего настроения, но всё же будьте аккуратны, пандемия никуда не делась. Мойте руки и носите маску в общественных местах, я так и делаю.

А теперь к обновлению:
С гордостью представляю новый раздел - Стикеры!
Теперь можно в один клик добавлять крутые стикеры в ваши истории
Так же поправил некоторые баги в статических шрифтах

Hello!
I remind you: Be careful, the pandemic has not gone away. Wash your hands and wear a mask in public places, I do so.

What's in the update?

Critical bug fix for iOS 13.5.1

Last update:

Introducing the new section - Stickers!
Now you can add cool stickers to your stories in one click
New static and calligraphic fonts

Hello!
Let me remind you: Be careful, the pandemic has not gone anywhere. Wash your hands and wear a mask in public, I do.

What's in the update?

- Bug fix for iOS 13.6
- Indicator for loading fonts and stickers
- New fonts and stickers
- New menu for copying text
- The app shouldn't crash anymore

Do you draw stickers? Contact me through the app :)

Редактором стало пользоваться в разы удобнее, попробуйте)

- Теперь можно отзеркалить элемент просто дважды тапнув по нему
- Ускорение работы редактора
- Исправление багов для iOS 14

P.S.: Мойте руки и носите маску!)

尝试一项新的独特功能-视频自动字幕

您的视频故事现在将获得更多观看次数和参与度
您不再需要第三方编辑器

您还可以使用我的应用程序的任何功能来创建独特的视频剪辑-随处可见字幕，图片，贴纸和其他文字！

如果您喜欢此更新，请留下评论）

WIDGET WIDGET WIDGET

Added the widget for iOS 14: now you can monitor the number of subscribers for your Instagram and TikTok accounts!
Added multi-language fonts. Now only the most popular ones support this feature, but more will come in the future!

And we fixed some bugs!)

WIDGET WIDGET WIDGET

Added multi-language fonts. Now only the most popular ones support this feature, but more will come in the future!

And we fixed some bugs!)

Updated subtitles UI
Added sticker pack repainting feature

Last release:

Meet the all-time biggest app update:

+ Fully redesigned app. Hope you guys like the new sleek look!
+ New editor - featuring cool tools like layer guidelines;
+ Improved speech recognition for subtitles. Also, really improved subtitle editing;
+ Found and fixed couple bugs.

Really hope you enjoy the new release! With love, the dev team :3

Improved sticker recoloring.

Good day and great weather to everyone :)

+ In this version we have added something cool - animated stickers!
• They can be recolored in any color, just like our fonts!
+ Tutorial videos have appeared in the settings, which clearly show how to use our application.

We also fixed bugs and accelerated the application, thanks for being with us!)

+ Now you can change the animation speed of animated stickers

We also fixed bugs and accelerated the application, thanks for being with us!)

Hi!

Meet the big update!

● Saving projects!
You asked a lot, and we finally did it :)

● Layers! Now you can fast move elements on the canvas, block layer or duplicate
● 3D transformation - now you can rotate any text or sticker as you like, making your Stories even more better
● Fonts will now prompt you to paste your clipboard photo directly onto your canvas (enabled in settings)

Also fixed bugs and sped up the app, thanks for being with us, it's going to be even cooler from now on!)

Meet "Leto" - that's the name of our app now!)

● Added Backgrounds for your Stories
We'll be adding new ones once a week.

● Share project
A long press on the project icon will open a menu, where you will find a new item - «Share project»
Now you can make a Stories and send it to your friend!

Fixed bugs, and hopefully did not add new ones)

Meet our update:
● Background Removal - Neural Eraser (beta)
Now you can remove the background from the photo in 1 tap and make your creativity even more unique

● Photo and sticker cropping
Easily crop photos and stickers to any size and format you need right in the Editor

● Backgrounds for posts can now be added to Favorites

Fixed bug with large texts in projects and some other bugs, thanks for using it)
Your feedback really helps us develop the app! We do it with love (•◡•)
